column2: "Oh, <%me>, you came at a good time."
"I just saw Afin a minute ago, and something about him seemed off."
"He seemed like he was somewhere else. I asked if he wanted to go with me, but he vaguely turned me down."
"It seemed like he was troubled about something.... no, that's definitely the case."
"When he helped me out before, he didn't seem like that. He was more energetic."
"I'd like to lend a hand if I could, but I don't know what I could do..."
"It may not be my place, but <%me>, keep an eye on him."
"This area is dangerous. I don't want to think of what would happen if you got caught up in something in that state."
"Maybe I'm letting my imagination get the best of me."
